title: Case-Based Project Design for Strengthening Online Science Writing Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in science and academic writing experience, proficiency in digital device usage
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment, aiming to strengthen practical scientific writing competencies. Applies activity theory centered on learner collaboration and feedback

learning_goals: Learners can write abstracts for academic papers that clearly convey complex scientific concepts
Learners can revise scientific reports at least twice by incorporating peer feedback
Learners can collaboratively complete science-related blog posts reflecting community needs

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
